name: The Arabian Nights
description:
This is a world of letters. In this world, all the characters that appear are just a "silhouette" of reality. The silhouette is just a trace left by the noumenon in this time and space. We don't know how they really are now. But we can catch a glimpse of their stories through these memories of the world fixed in the letter. Among the many unconscious silhouettes, a special silhouette was born. He began to wander in the letter, watching others' stories and looking for his own part of self. Each level represents a letter sent or not sent, representing a memory. Players will extract key word information through the content of the "letter", and then the images contained in the words will be embodied into related capabilities. 

WASD for movement

SPACE for jump

Mouse  for  shadow controlling
